General.Name: Honest Company Inc
General.Description: The Honest Company, Inc. manufactures and sells diapers and wipes, skin and personal care, and household and wellness products. It offers baby care products, mama care products, baby clothing, and diaper bags; skin care products, including cleansers, moisturizers, serums and treatments, eye creams, and skincare kits; and face, eye, and lip makeup products, as well as makeup kits and brushes. The company also provides shower and bath products, hair care, face and body lotion, body care kits, and vitamins and supplements. In addition, it sells its products through digital and retail sales channels, such as its website and third-party ecommerce sites, as well as brick and mortar retailers. The Honest Company, Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 12130 Millennium Drive, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90094
